item.title: Cones awaiting collection, 10th July
item.description:
2 cones on the triangle of green grass discarded after road closure signage removed need to be collected.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Discarded cones, 10th July
item.description:
Reports have been closed BUT THE CONES ARE STILL THERE WAITING FOR COLLECTION. This is a disgrace! Grass is growing out the top of the one on the junction & the other is chucked in the hedge which is a blatant disregard for the environment.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Gully requires clearing!, 9th July
item.description:
The gully on the corner of Great Norwood Street and Gratton Street is blocked. I was assured in previous correspondence over a year ago that this would be cleared but it has still not happened. I have a damp issue at the property which Severn Trent have said they cannot investigate further until the gully is cleared.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Gratton Street, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Streetlight no longer working, 9th July
item.description:
Photograph with a clear pole and a light in 2010 second photograph covered in vegetation July 2025. The house behind the pole is unoccupied. If there is no requirement for the street lamp, please can it be removed? W3W pardon.frowns.gossiped

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Gretton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole, 9th July
item.description:
Outside 6 Linworth Road. Lots of debris in large pothole. The issue has been present for 1.5 years. The whole of Linworth Road is due to be repaved in July but wanted to report the issue as we need to claim vehicle damage of a tyre.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Linworth Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 9th July
item.description:
Road works have been going on here for months they have moved TM and lady cannot get on her drive. Looked at one.network and can see no works. She did say they were there in April, May and the whole of June and have just come back
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles
